title: The Incredibles
description: A family of undercover superheroes tries to live quietly but must save the world.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Shrek
description: An ogre, with a heart of gold, goes on a quest to rescue a princess.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death.

title: Up
description: An old man ties thousands of balloons to his house and flies away to South America.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather.

title: Zootopia
description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Frozen
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man to change the weather condition.

title: Inside Out
description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions conflict on how to navigate a new city and school.

title: Despicable Me
description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is changing him.

title: Kung Fu Panda
description: To everyone's surprise, a clumsy panda becomes the chosen Dragon Warrior and trains to protect his people.

title: Moana
description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

title: The Secret Life of Pets
description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

title: Madagascar
description: A group of animals from the Central Park Zoo escape and find themselves on the island of Madagascar.

title: Tangled
description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but a runaway thief stumbles upon her and changes her life.

title: Brave
description: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A special bond develops between a plus-sized inflatable robot and a prodigy who join forces to save the city.

title: Monsters, Inc.
description: In a city of monsters, energy is collected from the screams of children. But things go wrong when a human child enters their world.
